Setting Temporary File Options

To perform this procedure, you must first select the project database or project you want to configure. The project database or project must also be associated with a configuration file.

NOTE If you are using a Version Manager File Server, do not set WorkDir or ArchiveWork to a directory that is mapped to the file server.

To set temporary file options:

  1. Select Admin | Configure Project. The Configure Project dialog box appears with the General tab active.

  2. Select Temporary Files beneath Miscellaneous. The Temporary Files pane on the right appears. The values that display for each option are the settings that are currently defined in the configuration file associated with the project database or project.

  3. Enter the directory in which Version Manager will store the temporary archive copies.

  4. Enter the directory in which Version Manager will store the temporary internal files.

  5. Click OK if you are finished defining options, or click Apply to save the settings and continue to define other options.
